properties.script:
out0 = spark.sql(f"""
    SELECT
  '{Config.sourceSystem}'  AS SRC_SYS_CD,
  F4301.PHDOCO AS PO_NUM,
  F4301.PHKCOO AS PRCHSNG_CO_CD,
  F4301.PHDCTO AS PO_TYPE_CD,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PO_CAT_TYPE_CD,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS CRT_ON_DTTM,
  TRIM(F4301.PHAN8) AS SUP_NUM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PRCHSNG_ORG_NUM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PRCHSNG_ORG_DESCRIPTION,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PRCHSNG_GRP_NUM,
  TRIM(F4301.PHCRCD) AS CRNCY_CD,
  CASE
    WHEN LOWER(TRIM(F4301.PHTRDJ)) = 'null'
    OR TRIM(F4301.PHTRDJ) = ''
    OR TRIM(F4301.PHTRDJ) = '0' THEN TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL)
    ELSE TO_TIMESTAMP(
      substr(
        CAST(
          date_add(
            CONCAT(
              SUBSTR(
                CAST(
                  CAST(TRIM(F4301.PHTRDJ) AS INT) + 1900000 AS STRING
                ),
                1,
                4
              ),
              '-01-01'
            ),
            CAST(
              SUBSTR(
                CAST(
                  CAST(TRIM(F4301.PHTRDJ) AS INT) + 1900000 AS STRING
                ),
                5
              ) AS INT
            ) -1
          ) AS STRING
        ),
        1,
        10
      ),
      'yyyy-MM-dd'
    )
  END AS PO_DTTM,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS VLD_FROM_DTTM,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS VLD_TO_DTTM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS SUPL_VEND_NUM,
  TRIM(F4301.PHMCU) AS SUPL_PLNT_CD,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS RLSE_CMPLT_IND,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PMT_TERM_CD,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS OWN_EXPLN_OF_TERM_OF_PMT,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS RLSE_DOC_IND,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PO_STATUS_CODE,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PO_NOT_YET_CMPLT,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS DEL_IND,
  F4301.PHSFXO AS ORDR_SFX,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS OUR_REF,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS VERS_NUM_IN_PRCHSNG,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PRSN_WHO_CRT_A_PRCHSNG_DOC,
  CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL (18, 4)) AS EXCH_RT,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS CNTL_IN_FOR_PRCHSNG_DOC_TYPE,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS CHG_TIME_STMP_DTTM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ITM_NUM_INTV,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS LAST_ITM_NUM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS LANG_KEY,
  CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL (18, 4)) AS CASH_DISC_DAYS1,
  CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL (18, 4)) AS CASH_DISC_DAYS2,
  CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL (18, 4)) AS CASH_DISC_DAYS3,
  CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL (18, 4)) AS CASH_DISC_PCT_1,
  CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL (18, 4)) AS CASH_DISC_PCT_2,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS IN_FOR_FX_EXCH_RT,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS APPL_CLS_DTTM,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS DEADLN_FOR_SBMN_QUTN_DTTM,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS BIND_PER_FOR_QUTN_DTTM,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS WTY_DTTM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS BID_INVT_NUM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS QUTN_NUM,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS QUTN_SBMN_DTTM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS YOUR_REF,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS RESP_SLSPRSN_AT_SUP_OFF,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS SUP_PHN_NUM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS CUST_NUM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ACT_PRCHSNG_DOC,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS NUM_OF_PRIN_PRCH_AGMT,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS FLD_NOT_USED1,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS CMPLT_DELV_STIP_FOR_EA_PO,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS GOODS_RCPT_MSG_IN,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS FLD_NOT_USED2,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS INCOTERM1_CD,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS INCOTERM2_CD,
  CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL (18, 4)) AS TRGT_VAL_HDR_AREA_PER_DSTN,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS DSTN_TYPE_FOR_PRCHSNG_DOC,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS CLCTV_NUM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS NUM_OF_THE_DOC_COND,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PCDR,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS UPDT_GRP_FOR_STATS_UPDT,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS DIFF_INVC_PRTY,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS NUM_OF_FRGN_TRD_DATA,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS LOGL_SYS1,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ITM_NUM_INTV_FOR_SUBITM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS DOC_WTH_TIME_DEPN_COND,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS RLSE_GRP,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS RLSE_STRTGY,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PRCHSNG_DOC_RLSE_IN,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS RLSE_ST,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS CTRY_FOR_TAX_RPT,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ADDR_NUM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS CTRY_OF_SLS_TAX_ID_NUM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS VAT_REGS_NUM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS RSN_FOR_CNCL,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS DOC_NUM_FOR_ADDL,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS CORR_OF_MISC_PRVSN,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PRCHSNG_DOC_PRCSG_ST,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PRCS_IN_FOR_PRCH_ORDR,
  CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL (18, 4)) AS TOT_VAL_AT_TIME_OF_RLSE,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS CHG_RQST_STS,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS SCM_PRCS_CRT_THE_PO,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS GOODS_RCPT_RSN_CD,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS CAT_OF_ICMPT,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS RETN_IN,
  CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL (18, 4)) AS RETN_IN_PCT,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS DOWN_PMT_IN,
  CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL (18, 4)) AS DOWN_PMT_PCT,
  CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL (18, 4)) AS DOWN_PMT_AMT_IN_DOC_CRNCY,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS DOWN_PMT_DUE_DTTM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PRCS_ID_NUM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PART_OF_A_CNTRC_HIER,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS GRP_ID_FOR_CO_CD,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ID_OF_THE_PARNT_DOC,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS THRSH_VAL_FOR_EXCH_RT_EXIST,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS LEGAL_CNTRC_NUM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS CNTRC_NM,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS CNTRC_RLSE_DTTM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS SHIPPING_TYPE,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS LOC_PHY_HANDOVR_OF_GOODS,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS SHIPPING_COND,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS INCOTERMS_VERS,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS INCOTERMS_LOC_1,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS INCOTERMS_LOC_2,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS INCO_LOC_1_PLACE_OF_DEST,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS INCO_LOC_2_PLACE_OF_DELV,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS INCO_DEVT_PLACE_OF_DEST,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS CRNCY_STAT_VAL_FOR_FRGN_TRD,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS RLVNT_FOR_INTSTAT_RPTG,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS EXCLD_FROM_INTSTAT_RPTG,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PROD_CMPLI_SUP_CHK_STS,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PROD_MRKT_STS,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS DNGRS_GOODS_STS,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS SFTY_DATA_SHT_STS,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS QUTN_CAN_BE_SBMTD_DTTM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PRCHSNG_DOC_CAT,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PRCHSNG_DOC_TYPE,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS DATA_ELMNT_OF_PRCHNG_DOC_HDR,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ID_OF_EXTRNL_REF_SYS,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS EXTRNL_REF_ID,
  CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL (18, 4)) AS TMST_FOR_RVSN_OF_EXTRNL_CAL,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS BUSN_PRPS_CMPLT,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS DOC_IS_AGED,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS INTRNL_KEY_FOR_FRC_ELMNT,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS INTRNL_CNTR,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS RELOC_ID,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS RELOC_STEP_ID,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS LOGL_SYS,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS TRX_NUM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ITM_GRP,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS LAST_VAS_ITM_NUM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ORDR_SCHDLNG_STRTGY,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS REF_UUID_OF_TRSPN_MGMT,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ANNXNG_PKG_KEY,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS EXTD_KEY_FOR_ANNXNG_PKG,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS BASE_DTTM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ANNXNG_DT_TYPE1,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS ANNXNG_STRT_DTTM,
  CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL (18, 4)) AS DEVT_PCT,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ANNXD_ORDR_TYPE_IN,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS ANNXD_LMT_DTTM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS IL_ANNXNG_NUMRTR,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS GENL_ACCNT_METH_DTTM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ACCNT_GENL_METH,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS DO_NOT_ALLW_NGTV_ANNXNG,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PRCHSNG_ORG,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS KNW_INDX_IN_IN,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS FL_FOR_S1POSTAT_MSG,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS INT_IN,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS SNAP_STS,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PCDR_NUM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ADJUSTMENT,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS CNTRC,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS LEGAL_CMPTC,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS MISC,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS DESPATCH,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS DTTM1,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS JOB1,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS ASES,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS DTTM2,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS JOB2,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PTFM_CNTRC_IN_PRCHSNG_PRCS,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS DOC_FOR_SEAS_PO_PRCSG,
  TO_TIMESTAMP(NULL) AS DELV_HDR_DTTM,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS PLNT_HDR,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS FIRM_DEAL_IN,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS TAKE_ACCT_OF_PRCH_GRP,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS TAKE_ACCT_OF_PLNT,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS TAKE_ACCT_OF_CNTRC,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS TAKE_ACCT_OF_ITM_CTGY,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS TAKE_ACCT_OF_FX_DT_PRCH_IN,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS CNSDR_BGT,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS TAKE_ACCT_OF_ALLC_TBL_RLVNC,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS TAKE_ACCT_OF_DLVY_PER,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS TAKE_ACCT_OF_DELV_DT,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS INCL_VEND_SUBRNGE,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS OTB_CHK_LVL,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS OTB_COND_TYPE,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS UNIQ_NUM_OF_BGT,
  CAST(NULL AS DECIMAL (18, 4)) AS REQ_BGT,
  CAST(NULL AS STRING) AS OTB_CRNCY
FROM
  {Config.sourceDatabase}.F4301
WHERE
  F4301._DELETED_ = 'F'  
 
""")
